Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Governor Cuomo "established death panels and lotteries" instead of purchasing ventilators.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that a task force in 2015 did not make a recommendation about purchasing more ventilators.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence provided to support the statement that Governor Cuomo rejected buying recommended ventilators in 2015.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes a problematic assumption that Governor Cuomo should have been responsible for purchasing his own ventilators.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation provided by Governor Cuomo that the only way to obtain ventilators is from the federal government.
